main: ^An annual festival full of illuminated replicas of iconic landmarks from around the world. It is held in Tangub City in Misamis Occidental. - They take decorating for the holidays seriously that the word simple doesn’t even exist. It is one of the most anticipated Christmas shows in Northern Mindanao.

c-0: ^It brings some of the world’s famous landmarks in a spectacle of light & gigantic art displays. Tangub City has even been dubbed the “Christmas symbols capital of Mindanao.”
